title: ArtifactVersion
description:
An artifact version.

This is a freeform identifier with some basic validation. It may be the serialized form of a semver version, or a custom identifier that uses the same character set as a semver.

For the exact regex pattern accepted by [`ArtifactVersion::new`], see [`ArtifactVersion::REGEX`].

# Ord implementation

`ArtifactVersion`s are not intended to be sorted, just compared for equality. `ArtifactVersion` implements `Ord` only for storage within sorted collections.
